Package me.masstrix.eternalnature.player

Class OrderedFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.masstrix.eternalnature.player.OrderedFormat
  • public class OrderedFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the parsing and updating of formatted text. This allows for you to create formatted text such as The time is %time% on %day% and have it parsed into it's separate components and tags. Ig a tag is not registered it will be ignored and read as standard text otherwise it will be replaced with it's registered instance.

    Tags are defined in formatted text by encasing the name of the tag in percent symbols. There can not be any spaces in a tag, if there are spaces it will be invalid, it's recommended for better reading to instead use underscores.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  OrderedFormat.TagFormatter
      This is a basic utility helper for OrderedFormat for storing tags.

    • Method Detail

      • registerTag

        public OrderedFormat registerTag​(java.lang.String name,
                                 OrderedFormat.TagFormatter formatter)
        Adds a new tag for the formatter. Any tag that is registered will be replaced in the parsed text with it.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the tag that is used as a placeholder in the text for example if we have a tag named test, any occurrence of %test% in the parsed text will be replaced with it.
        formatter - formatter that operates for this tag.
        Returns:
        an instance of this ordered format.

      • praseFormat

        public OrderedFormat praseFormat​(java.lang.String format)
        Parse a format from a string value and breaks it down into base components to be used as either BaseComponent[] or a legacy string later.
        Parameters:
        format - format to parse.
        Returns:
        an instance of this ordered format.

      • getFormatted

        public net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[] getFormatted()
        Returns the last version of the formatted text. This will never call for an update and always return the cached version of the format.
        Returns:
        the formatted text as an array of components.

      • getFormatted

        public net.md_5.bungee.api.chat.BaseComponent[] getFormatted​(boolean update)
        Returns the formatted text. If update is enabled it will rebuild the text calling each tag for a refresh, otherwise it will return the last updated version.
        Parameters:
        update - should all tags be updated.
        Returns:
        the newly formatted text as an array of components.

      • getLegacy

        public java.lang.String getLegacy()
        Returns the last version of the formatted text. This will never call for an update and always return the cached version of the format.
        Returns:
        the formatted text as legacy text.

      • getLegacy

        public java.lang.String getLegacy​(boolean update)
        Returns the formatted text in legacy formatting. Legacy formatted is non-json formatting and may not be fully supported on all areas of the spigot api so using getFormatted(boolean) is recommended instead when possible. If update is enabled it will rebuild the text calling each tag for a refresh, otherwise it will return the last updated version.
        Parameters:
        update - should all tags be updated.
        Returns:
        the newly formatted text as a legacy string.
